eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm

Class FileChangeInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm.FileChangeInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable<FileChangeInfo>, XSerializable

    public class FileChangeInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements XSerializable, Copyable<FileChangeInfo>
    Record to store a FileInfo and a change reason.

    In case of NEW or MODIFIED type the file contains the current file status. In case of a DELETED type, the file contains the last known file status.

    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.10.06.
